front.title: IEEE Standard for Pad-Mounted-Type, Self-Cooled, Single-Phase Distribution Transformers 250 kVA and Smaller: High Voltage, 34 500 GrdY/19 920 V and Below; Low Voltage, 480/240 V and Below - Corrigendum 1: Figure 1A

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Identified in the 2014 published version of IEEE Std C57.12.38 is an error. Tw0 dimensions were provided for the high-voltage bushing height above the base of the transformer. The lower dimension (597+114/-13) should have been designated as being for units 167 kVA and 250 kVA only. The error is corrected in this corrigendum.
